scheme.title: Splunk Add-on for OpenTelemetry Collector
scheme.description: Deploys the Splunk OpenTelemetry Collector as a modular input for the Splunk Universal Forwarder

arg.name: splunk_access_token
arg.title: Splunk Access Token
arg.description: Access token used to send data to Splunk Observability

arg.name: splunk_config
arg.title: Splunk Config
arg.description: Config file that will be used by the Splunk_TA_OTel_Collector

arg.name: splunk_realm
arg.title: Splunk Realm
arg.description: Splunk Observability realm to which data will be sent to

arg.name: splunk_api_url
arg.title: Splunk API URL
arg.description: Specifies the Splunk Observability API endpoint

arg.name: splunk_ingest_url
arg.title: Splunk Ingest URL
arg.description: Specifies the Splunk Observability ingest endpoint

arg.name: splunk_listen_interface
arg.title: Splunk Listen Interface
arg.description: Address for the listening interfaces opened by the Splunk_TA_OTel_Collector

arg.name: splunk_collector_log_level
arg.title: Splunk Collector Log Level
arg.description: Specifies the log level to be used by the Splunk_TA_OTel_Collector
